title: Quick Fill Keyboard
body:
This is a keyboard app

Quick Fill Keyboard allows the user to quickly fill in their personal info just with a few taps.

It uses extension target and UITextDocumentProxy protocol.

It also has a slideshow page control to guide users through the steps of setting up a new keyboard.

Shared NSUserDefaults between the app and extension in order to retrieve user's input information.

title: Nebulous
body:
This is a weather app.

Nebulous uses DarkSky API to get the current weather data.

Implement CLLocation to get user current location as well as the selected location. Able to save user's saved location in disk.

Display hourly weather forecast with separated section header.

Note: Castro and I pair-programmed on this app for 3 days, and we were able to get the main features done before the demo.

title: SimpleTee
body:
This is a t-shirt app

Simple Tees is a project that I worked on with two other developers from Code Fellows for a local t-shirt company.

â€‹It lets the users to customize their t-shirt and prints it out and ship it to them.

It uses Parse as the backend to store user's info, and we use Stripe cloud code (in javascript) to process the payment.
